item.title: Mathematica Install
item.description: We donâ€™t need using root to execute the file. Install Location Create an folder in /opt/ and change owner to normal user mkdir Mathematica chown zong:users mathematica provide following position for Mathematica /opt/Mathematica/11.3 create directory type y it will start installing Start Script in order to start Mathematica and change nothing in our system. Create a folder bin under Mathematica folder. cd /opt/Mathematica/11.3 mkdir bin chown zong:users bin type following command in Mathematica install terminal
